issue.description: A concise title summarizing the issue

severity.description: Impact level of the issue on the Kubernetes manifest and runtime

location.description: Location in the YAML where the issue occurs, including line number and content snippet

description.description: Detailed explanation of the issue and its operational impact

standard.description: The relevant Kubernetes documentation or best practice guideline violated, if any

link.description: URL to the official documentation or guideline

recommendation.description: Recommended fix or corrected configuration snippet

score.description: Overall quality score of the manifest, from 0 to 100

scoreCriteria.description: Explanation of score calculation based on issues found and severity

correctedFile.description: The fully corrected Kubernetes YAML manifest after applying all recommendations
